name: Sonora Cruz

topics.response_text: I'm guessing that you've come about the notice. You know, I've heard about you.
Well, it's about time someone put that bastard out of his misery.
Fantastic. Well, take this coat. We all wear them. The unrighteous fear the sight of the Regulators.

topics.topic_text: I'm not one for causes. I just want to get paid.
topics.response_text: Fair enough. We'll still take the help where we can get it.

topics.topic_text: Yes. I want to join you.
topics.response_text: Fantastic. Take this coat. We all wear them. The unrighteous fear the sight of the Regulators.
We're the Regulators. We've dedicated our lives to bringing the evil to justice.

topics.topic_text: What do you do with these fingers?
topics.response_text: Nothing. Nothing at all. They only serve to mark the fact that justice has been done.

topics.topic_text: Is this all of the Regulators?
topics.response_text: Oh, no. We're spread all around. The few here just assist me in organizing things here at the headquarters.

topics.topic_text: I have fingers to collect the bounty on.
topics.response_text: Then you've been busy. Good. Show me what you have.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I don't have any right now.
topics.response_text: If this is a joke, I am not amused. Justice is serious business.

topics.topic_text: Actually, never mind. I'll hang on to them.
topics.response_text: I can't imagine why you'd want to, but the choice is yours.

conversation.response_text: Well, hello there. I heard we might be getting a new recruit.

description:
Sonora Cruz is a 39 year-old Hispanic Female.

Sonora Cruz is the determined leader of the Regulators, a justice-seeking organization operating in the Capital Wasteland. With a stern demeanor and unwavering commitment to her cause, she can typically be found in a shadowed corner of the Regulator HQ's upstairs room, observing all who enter with sharp, discerning eyes. Despite the harshness of the wasteland, she maintains a sense of order and moral clarity that few others possess.

Sonora Cruz's Personality: Sonora is serious, disciplined, and deeply principled. She possesses a strong sense of justice and little patience for those who don't share her dedication to maintaining order in the chaotic wasteland. While not cruel, she is firm in her beliefs and expects the same level of commitment from those who would join her cause. She values efficiency and results over pleasantries, viewing the Regulators' mission as too important for trivialities.

Sonora Cruz's Backstory: Born in the ruins of what was once Washington D.C., Sonora grew up in the harsh realities of the Capital Wasteland. Her family was among those who suffered greatly from the lawlessness that plagued the region, an experience that forged her determination to bring order to the chaos. As she grew older, she became disillusioned with the ineffective authorities and took matters into her own hands. After several years of operating as a lone vigilante, she founded the Regulators, an organization dedicated to hunting down and dispensing justice upon the most notorious criminals in the wasteland.
